Room.Name: Orchard Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Orchard Lane near the rear end of the Dragon's Citadel.
Room.LongDescription: The magnificent Dragon's Citadel lies to the south of Orchard Lane, but the entrance to the Citadel is located on the other side of the building. The fantastic structure was built ages ago and is thought to be abandoned by its original owners.
